noEventsInRange: There are no appointments or sessions in the selected period.
noAppointmentsThisDay: There are no appointments on this day.
pickDateAndTime: Please choose a date and time.
dayOutOfRange: The selected day is outside the available consultation days.
timeBeforeAvailable: The selected time is before the available window starts.
timeAfterAvailable: The selected time is after the available window ends.
rescheduleSuccess: The new appointment has been confirmed successfully.
rescheduleDescription: Choose a new date and time for the consultation within the available slots.
consultationConfirmedDescription: The new consultation appointment has been confirmed successfully.
